acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.

documentation.text: @notice Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.
@notice Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

@title The ConfirmedOwner contract
 @notice A contract with helpers for basic contract ownership.
